channel.description: Let’s detail the handling process of an XML request within XAPI. The first document uses the migration as an example of such request. How the migration request goes through Xen API?

item.title: From RPC migration request to xapi internals
item.description: Overview In this document we will use the VM.pool_migrate request to illustrate the interaction between various components within the XAPI toolstack during migration. However this schema can be applied to other requests as well. Not all parts of the Xapi toolstack are shown here as not all are involved in the migration process. For instance you won’t see the squeezed nor mpathalert two daemons that belong to the toolstack but don’t participate in the migration of a VM.
